website_summaries.verdict: This adorable teething toy has the ability to comfort while soothing aching gums.
pros: Soft and huggable with textured rubber teether feet for chewing
Features a crinkle belly that's stimulating and entertaining
Quite possibly the cutest teething toy around
cons: Crinkly midsection may not hold up well to machine washing

customer_reviews.title: Listing is Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy. But the advertising is deceptive. It says color and print may vary, but makes it seem as if both toys come together, except for a small note. I wouldn’t have minded paying for both, but suggest Amazon review the listing and have it corrected for clarity. It comes off as an attempt at fraud. Is there a way I can select the elephant for purchase? I still want two of these (I have twins).
customer_reviews.author: Carrie K.

customer_reviews.title: I like the product but they need to be more clear I thought I was getting both giraffe and elephant
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but they need to be more clear I thought I was getting both giraffe and elephant
customer_reviews.author: Regina Yager

customer_reviews.title: I love it, you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I ordered one and really wanted the giraffe but got the elephant instead. Super cute nonetheless, can’t wait for my lo to play with it. I ended up ordering two more to try my luck. I figure it might be good to keep one in her diaper bag and a spare just in case. I did put it in a laundry bag and tossed it in the washer and then dried it in the dryer and it’s just fine as you can see. :) Update: I did order two more and got two giraffes. So now I have both. The giraffe also washed and dried well in the washer/dryer. :D
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dubs

customer_reviews.title: Fooled by the ad... only got one
customer_reviews.text: I only received one of the teethers in the picture but two was advertised... Maybe it should have been specified if I was only able to purchase one of the other. The ad was severely misleading
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Keen

customer_reviews.title: Baby's new favorite
customer_reviews.text: 4mos was in love with his snuggle teether straight away. Well constructed. Fun crinkle sound and chewy feet. We received the giraffe. It is flat and floppy and very lightweight making it ideal for an infant's developing fine motor skills. My son had an easy time handling this and chewing on it. The very first time holding his new snuggle teether he instantly wanted to hold it and play with it. It's his new favorite toy. Also, it can totally go into the washing machine which is great because it's going to get chewed on a whole bunch!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I got 2!
customer_reviews.text: I received 2! I read the reviews and the biggest complaint was that the picture was misleading and that they only received 1. I went ahead and ordered anyways because I didn’t think $5 was bad for just one of them. I was blown away when I received 2 of them and I can’t wait to give them to my little one for Christmas. I’ll update this review once she has played with it them!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Picture
customer_reviews.text: Picture looks like you're getting both elephant and girrafe...no place to choose one or the other looks like you get both also recommended getting other items with this shows picture of both... only one came... Very dissatisfied and this is misleading item for sale.
customer_reviews.author: Butter

customer_reviews.title: Misleading ad!
customer_reviews.text: Misleading!!! Only received one- thought I was getting two. Guess I will head to Walmart and buy another as I have teething twins and one isn't enough. Nice to see that some people actually received two.
customer_reviews.author: #twinning2017

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Advertisement!! Not Actually a Set!
customer_reviews.text: The toy is nice but I am very disappointed and wish I had read the reviews. I thought I was buying a set of two. I could have purchased this single item much cheaper if I had realized. I feel cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Perry

customer_reviews.title: Only get one÷
customer_reviews.text: You only get one of the picture items nor both.
customer_reviews.author: Shinny77

customer_reviews.title: You only get 1 animal!
customer_reviews.text: Beware - you only receive 1 teether! Yes, If I had read the detailed product description I would have seen that but the photo is very misleading. You cannot elect but only get either the giraffe or elephant. I was looking for a spare elephant for my son but received only the giraffe which I also already have and he doesn't care for.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Should Be More Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Design is Great -my baby loves the color, very catchy. The plastic-like sound is attracts his attention. Hard to clean -I usually sterilizes stuff the my child put inside his mouth. I’m not comfortable to just clean it with baby laundry soap then serve as a teether. Maybe when he’s older. No information was given on how to properly clean the toy especially the teether part. Not so Ok With The Price -being around 6usd, I don’t think it’s worth it. I just couldn’t return it since my baby already used it. Maybe 2 toys toys for this price will do.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Helpful

customer_reviews.title: Giraffe
customer_reviews.text: You don't get to choose the critter; I ordered kinda hoping for the giraffe, which I did receive. It's cute. Nice bright colors, different textures for baby to explore. As soon as I handed it to him, it went straight in his mouth :) He's been chewing on the nose and head pretty much ever since. He'll put it down, get busy with something else on his exersaucer, swivel back around, see it and laugh, grab it and right back in his mouth. He's very happy with it, so of course we are too!
customer_reviews.author: McGaugh

customer_reviews.title: Okay Toy; Confusing Item Description
customer_reviews.text: The toy was cute and my baby likes it okay, though it's not as big as it looks in the picture and it's only one of the toys, not both of them, despite the confusing product title. The item was described as assorted, which to me means there's more than one since it takes more than one of something to make an assortment. Plus, the price was kind of high for just one of them. Had I realized the price was only for one, I wouldn't have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great first toy!
customer_reviews.text: My sons first and so far favorite toy! He loves the crinkle sound and teething ends. He started playing with it just over two months old. We dropped it on a dirty restaurant floor and brought it home and washed with hot water and soap and it cleaned up perfectly. My dog actually got ahold of the giraffe so we had to reorder right away before he knew it was missing and we got the elephant the second time, both are great! Might order a back up just Incase!
customer_reviews.author: Boshake

customer_reviews.title: FASLE ADVERTISERS!
customer_reviews.text: This looked advertised as TWO TEETHING TOYS but only 1 is all you’re really getting. PLEASE REMOVE THIS FALSE ADVERTISEMENT!
customer_reviews.author: Coyote Bong-Water

customer_reviews.title: VERY MISLEADING YOU ONLY GET ONE OF THE TWO SHOWING
customer_reviews.text: I just dislike that I ordered this. It’s two teething toys and only received one of them. Already contacted the business and apparently they are behind on responding. Haven’t heard from them since they said it take 5 business days . It’s been longer than that. Only thing I can do is file a claim again. I just want my other toy that I paid for. So far the one I have is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned on here the advertising is very misleading I thought I was going to receive two and instead I received one. I also was expecting to receive the plastic ring that connects the toy to a carrier or stroller (as pictured) but the toy doesn't come with that either. I think I'm going to send this item back especially after also seeing a customer on here show purple ink coming out of the toy when it gets wet. Not comfortable with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: You only get one animal and you can’t choose which one you want.
customer_reviews.text: Received only one animal (elephant), it’s cute, but was expecting both animals. Picture very deceiving and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: TMShopper

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved
customer_reviews.text: Second teething elephant I buy for my baby. She loved the first one but I accidentally damaged the first one when I left it in high dry in the dryer. My baby loved it since she was 4 months old, because it was easy to hold, very entertaining because of the crisp sound it makes when holding it, so I also bought her the musical expressions elephant for car seat and she enjoyed it too. I recommended it to a friend and her baby loved both of them too 😊
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia

customer_reviews.title: Car seat buddy
customer_reviews.text: Received the giraffe oh is he cute. Our 4mo old boy (3mo when we first got it) loves this toy. Is so easy for him to hold and he loves the crinkle noise it makes. Has held up great for a month so far, it almost always goes in the car seat with him to keep him company/entertained. He hasn't really used for teething yet as he prefers to try to suck on its head instead of the teething feet. Really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Great for older kids with Autism and sensory needs too
customer_reviews.text: I have a non verbal almost 8 year old and he plays with this toy and the other one that is just like it ALL the time. It is one of his favorites. He is in daycare with another child who is blind with autism and they both love these toys. Most people think of this as a baby toy so they over look it for an older child. During the Covid quarintine I needed to keep him happy and bought several different sensory needs items and this one was a real winner.
customer_reviews.author: jeanops

customer_reviews.title: My daughter likes to chew on it all day long
customer_reviews.text: when I first opened the package I thought one of the toys was missing, but then I went back and noticed that only one is included in the price. That was somewhat upsetting but the fact that my daughter loves it makes up for my mistake
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Misleading listing
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying both the giraffe & elephant when ordering this item. When it arrived it was only the giraffe. There should be something stated that you’re only receiving one item at their choosing. I will say that my baby seems to enjoy the giraffe!
customer_reviews.author: Liz R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the toy but extremely disappointed with only receiving one not both
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely disappointed because I payed for the elephant and the giraffe but only got the giraffe my baby absolutely loves it he sleeps with it too I wanted to just receive the missing one not return the one my baby fell in love with he cries if I take it away Its ridiculous that there is no other options
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R

customer_reviews.title: Only comes with one toy not two as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This only comes with the elephant alone and not the giraffe too. The only reason I ordered this was because it was supposed to come with 2 toys not just one, even if I got only one I primarily wanted the giraffe anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: YOU ONLY GET ONE
customer_reviews.text: MY 5 MONTH OLD LOVES IT❗️Per package instructions. You should wipe down with little soap on a wet towel. DO NOT SUBMERGE IN WATER. I Gave 4 Stars because I thought I was getting 2 items (BOTH the Elephant 🐘 and The Giraffe 🦒) SUGGEST THAT SELLER POST TWO DIFFERENT LISTINGS PER ITEM)
customer_reviews.author: R. Hisle

customer_reviews.title: ONLY ONE TOY SHOWED UP!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this product I thought I was going to be getting TWO toys! The picture is very misleading, it should say in the title that you will only get one.
customer_reviews.author: Keeley Tabitha Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good elephant!
customer_reviews.text: Our LO got this at 4 months and was just learning to hold it and take it to the mouth. She is now 6 months and still plays with it and is very much attracted to the toy and still using it as a teether. We received the elephant. 4 stars not for the product but for the vendor because we were not able to choose which animal (elephant or giraffe) we wanted. The elephant has held up very well in the washer/dryer cycle, it has survived about 5 to 6 washes with no wear.
customer_reviews.author: Let's roll.

customer_reviews.title: Stiching came loose
customer_reviews.text: The stiching came loose the day we got it. Has to be thrown away as a 4 month old cannot play with toys with lose threads. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other Bright stars
customer_reviews.text: I got the little blue Bright Stars Snuggle and Teethe as a gift for my oldest boy (now2) and he LOVES IT STILL. I wanted to get a similar toy for my new born but not the elephant so my older boy doesn't get upset. What arrives in the mail was much bigger but the crinkle inside didn't stay in one suit and didn't cover the whole tummy area...it looks and feels like a knock off by comparison
customer_reviews.author: Natashya Rowden

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but of high quality
customer_reviews.text: As long as you're okay with being surprised by the toy you get, it is a good product. Although my daughter is personally not entertained by the toy for more than a few minutes, it is of high quality. The crinkling noise the toy makes is interesting for babies, there are a few spots for the baby to safely munch while teething, and the fabric has held up so far (in terms of stitching and how easily it is cleaned). Overall a nice, and cheap toy. (I received the giraffe toy.)
customer_reviews.author: sydney miller

customer_reviews.title: Great travel toy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter to have with her on the plane while we were traveling. Turns out, she loves it so much that I just keep it in the diaper bag for any time we are on the go. She loves the crinkling noise it makes, uses it for teething, and thinks it is fun to throw back and forth with me. She is a big fan so that means I am too!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Quiel

customer_reviews.title: Great Baby Toy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my teething little one and she loves it. The outer material is super soft. There is a layer of crinkle fabroc inside the monkey and the feet are made of super easy to clean silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Mary/Barb

customer_reviews.title: 6mo's favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the first toys I ever purchased for my son and at 6 months old, it is still one of his favorites. Initially he was attracted to the crinkly body, but now he is all about the teether feet. I've purchased several of these for my son and have given some away as gifts. While it would be nice to be able to chose between the giraffe or the elephant, both are super cute and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves them, but parts missing
customer_reviews.text: First off, I'm missing the elephant. My package today had the rattle and the giraffe in it, but not the elephant. I had been given an elephant teether before and my baby loves it. She likes to make it crinckle and loves munching on the trunk. I wish I could clean it easier, which is why I ordered this set, so I could have more for her. She loves to chew on it and examine it
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gross

customer_reviews.title: perfect for beginning to grab
customer_reviews.text: I bought this elephant on a whim. My baby loves the crinkle noise so I looked for that specific toy. At 3 months the toy is perfect for him to grab. I received the elephant and it is as the picture describes. It has a thin body to make it easier to grab. It is one of my favorite toys currently.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina George

customer_reviews.title: Good baby toy
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that we didn't get the giraffe. I didn't read clearly enough that we might not. Oh well. We got the monkey and my baby loves it. One of the few toys we always put in her carseat with her. She can chew on it and it makes just enough noise to entertain her.
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: Misleading listing
customer_reviews.text: Misleading listing. It says "assorted" and has a picture of two toys. So one would assume you get one of each as assorted usually means a mix. Instead you only get ONE. This is only mentioned at the very bottom of the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi H.

customer_reviews.title: U only get 1 item instead of 2.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this teething toys for my 3 months old son. I thought I’m buying 2 but I only get 1. My son room is a elephant theme what am I going to do with this giraffe now? Usually they have options on the bottom and u pick which u like. But this item in the same pic I thought I’m getting 2. And u have no option to pick what u want. Good thing about this item is easy to wash. Kids get really dirty sometimes so is nice that u can wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: And I’m sure my eight-month-old daughter will love this!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking it was a two pack. But you only receive one or the other. I got the giraffe in mine. And I’m sure my eight-month-old daughter will love this!
customer_reviews.author: Stefani Ibbetson

customer_reviews.title: Cute teether, misleading listing...
customer_reviews.text: We received this today. It's a cute product that I'm sure our child will enjoy. I did think that it came with two toys so I think the listing should be clarified as this was extremely disappointing and I probably would have opted for a different teether for the price. I will update after the baby comes and we can see how long this holds up as I can't answer that as of now.
customer_reviews.author: BAM2017

customer_reviews.title: Not what you expect
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read the fine print I guess and thought I was getting both of them but ended up getting the giraffe and I really wanted the elephant one. The giraffe is not the best because the body is so long. When I washed it for the first time the material inside ended up all going into one corner so he can’t even make the sounds now. I didn’t dry it and it did that. My oldest had a monkey and it held up way better!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Gripe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old baby LOVES it! It’s her favorite toy right now. It crinkles which she loves and has teethers on it. It’s soft and easy for her to hold. Love it! I bought an extra one I case anything ever happens to the other one 😂
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I’ll be buying more
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable! My son is almost 3 months so a little young still but he likes to grab it and hear the crinkling sound. It’s super soft and I know it will come in handy when he starts to teethe. I will be getting more of these, super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steph01

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We got the elephant one and its super cute my little teether loves chewing on the plastic legs and also the soft ears. It's also a great size and can be nice to snuggle with. It's gone in the wash and dryer a few times already and still in great shape! It also has a small loop on the back of the head that you can loop the little toy chain links (which I purchased separately) to so you can hang it from the carseat handle or swing or stroller. Totally recommend it if you have a little one teething or not.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Cute giraffe for playtime.
customer_reviews.text: My baby isn't teething yet but he still loves this toy. It crinkles and I make it dance to entertain him. It's really soft and easy to clean. It is big compared to him but it doesn't seem to bother him he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: @Chrissycupcake420

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it-an instant hit. He loved the crinkles and immediately teethed on the ends of the feet. Easy for a baby to hold onto and very cute. I thought it was a great value. Vendor packaged and shipped item well and it was received when expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H. McAlister

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight and fits in tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: Light to carry and my baby loves it. She uses it as a lovey and occasionally a teether if there’s nothing else around. The only thing is it’s hard to clean since you have to wash the whole thing and cant throw it in the dryer. Takes a while to get back, but worth the wait I’m sure.
customer_reviews.author: VAMars

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product, but thought it included both animals.
customer_reviews.text: The picture and description for the item was deceptive. Thought I was getting both animals for my son, only shipped with one. Otherwise the product itself is fine, son likes to play with and teethe on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Holt

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE RIGHT ITEM! New version is Cute but doesn’t look like a giraffe
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 2 stars because I was sent the wrong item. I was hoping to get the original version but instead I got the newer version. The newer version isn’t as cute as the original giraffe. AND I paid more money for this one than the listing for the new version. Kind of a rip off
customer_reviews.author: Jen0329

customer_reviews.title: Soft, crinkles, and easy for baby to grab.
customer_reviews.text: Our infant love his elephants and this one he loves just as much.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Halvorson

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves her "Mooby"
customer_reviews.text: We got the elephant. We named him Mooby. I don't know why. It just felt right. Our daughter loves him. She loves his crinkly sound, loves chewing on his feet (especially now that she has more coordination and can intentionally put them in her mouth), and every time we shake him in front of her she smiles. When we first got him she was 4 months old and thought it was the funniest thing she'd ever seen. She laughed and laughed this crazy laugh we'd never heard before. Definitely happy we purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Adler

customer_reviews.title: The great product I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for small hands. My five month old grandson was teething when he arrived at our house for a week vacation. Even though it said not to wash I washed it on gentle and the washing machine I didn't want to take a chance on germs what does virus going on before I gave it to the baby and air dried it. It turned out perfectly out of the washer and even the crinkle paper noise in the belly still worked. The baby loved it
customer_reviews.author: denise tolkacevic

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething and playing
customer_reviews.text: I was wishing I could throw this in the wash but the plastic makes it not possible. It is very cute with bright colors and scrunchy noises . My granddaughter is 9 months and loves it for teething and playing!
customer_reviews.author: JManos

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't do without these!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold, clean, teething and baby loves it! When baby is cranky I hand her this & she laughs. Thanks to all the makers of these wonderful lil teether, toys and entertaining items for babies!
customer_reviews.author: deb a.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! My son is obsessed with crinkle things, so this helps satisfy his curiosity and the feet are great for his teeth. [From Mrs. Maisano]
customer_reviews.author: Federico

customer_reviews.title: faded
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my little baby.Although the feet are a little big for her mouth. She can’t put whole feet on her mouth. She will be angry. But she still loves it.But when the second time I wash it. The blue ear have faded 😢.I don't think it's good for babies
customer_reviews.author: ann^_^

customer_reviews.title: Miss leading picture.
customer_reviews.text: I repeat the rest of the bad reviews. I really thought I was getting both animals and I only got one. Had to really search to find the fine print that it the item is chosen for you. At least I paid less than some of the people here and it's probably because people were disappointed with only getting one item. Maybe that's why they discounted it. Next time I'll look a little closer. It's a cute toy I'll be giving it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: K. C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy for my 4 month old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 month old son. I chose the monkey for him because i love monkeys and he loves it. He is teething right now so this was perfect for him. He likes to bite on the ears and the crinkled sound is a plus. Id say its his favorite toy at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: These little toys are great! Our baby loves how bright it is and chews on the little feet. We went with the "any" option which made it less money and are super happy with the little elephant we received.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, and easy for a 4 mo. old to hold
customer_reviews.text: This has been a favorite with my grandson. I ordered the Monkey teether, and it's very cute. He smiles when he sees it, and he loves mouthing it. It has an interesting "crinkle" sound.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: The description is deceiving you only get ONE. I don’t feel like it’s clear enough on the page. Besides that it’s really nice, easy to hold, and easy to wash. Would recommend for a teething baby toy.
customer_reviews.author: livlife

customer_reviews.title: Teether
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it. I wish the head was also has a plastic underlay . Sometimes my son gets spot all over the head and it has to be washed ofter because am afraid of germs storing inside .
customer_reviews.author: MissShantie

customer_reviews.title: Teething Babies
customer_reviews.text: Im only given 3 stars based off my experience and the feedback from my 7 month year old. He doesn't really care to much about it. I hand it to him and he will look at it and throw it. I was hoping this toy would be his favorite to help him with teething. I hope to find something that he will like to use for teething..
customer_reviews.author: Neisha

customer_reviews.title: Cute little toy.
customer_reviews.text: My little guy likes this toy. He was around 4 months when I purchased it - we received the giraffe. He chews on all parts of it and it is easy to toss in the wash when it needs it - I was it on a delicate cycle and allow it to air dry. So far it has held up well. We take it in the car and it is easy to stuff into the diaper bag. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KnB2013

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy to keep baby occupied
customer_reviews.text: The giraffe is my 5 month old's favorite toy. She can't go anywhere without her "Raffi" to keep her occupied. She loves the crispy body of the toy, the rubbery teether feet and soft face to chew on.
customer_reviews.author: Linz

customer_reviews.title: Great little toy!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome toy especially for the price. It was a little bigger than I expected and I was pleasantly surprised. It’s the perfect combination of soft and crinkly with teethy rubbery feet and soft tags also. Super easy for a younger baby to hold (mine is 12 weeks). Great little toy to throw in your diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amber J

customer_reviews.title: Cute giraffe
customer_reviews.text: Thia cute little toy hangs out on our carseat. It has teether feet,crinkles and has a good texture. Our LO chews away at it and seems to like it. Great toy to keep him busy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: So cute, my baby loves this teething toy!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves her giraffe! She’s teething and this provides comfort for her gums and she loves to cuddle the actual toy too. It only comes with one though, not 2 as shown in the picture (but this is clarified if you read the description). Recommended to mommas with teething babies!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Neubauer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: The only toy my daughter liked was a little book that crinkles and had chewy corners. I've been trying to get her to expand the toys she likes. We collect giraffes, so he's a great fit and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kitten to help her through teething. She actually plays with it and is so cute watching her drag it around with her. Great quality and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has each one of these between our house and the car. They are one of his favorite toys, and he loves the crinkle sounds and the chewing parts. He's 6 months old, so he is doing a lot of teething. I highly recommend these for babies.
customer_reviews.author: D. Card

customer_reviews.title: No Choice
customer_reviews.text: Not having a choice of which toy stinks. I wanted one of each as the babies I bought for are 2 months apart, I ordered 2 and of course I got 2 giraffes. It does state that but it still stinks. Item is cute and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Believe

customer_reviews.title: I received the elephant. Kid likes it.
customer_reviews.text: The testing feet would be better if it was the thicker, more rubbery plastic. My baby loves the crinkles inside, and the soft fuzz. I like the loop on the back so I can attach a clip to keep it from falling.
customer_reviews.author: S. K

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I guess I was confused I thought I was buying both and only got the giraffe.
customer_reviews.author: cari442

customer_reviews.title: Was ok
customer_reviews.text: The head is a little heavy it's super soft the feet are a hard plastic for teething My daughter doesn't seem to like it at all I guess it depends on your child and the age range my daughter is 3 1/2 months old
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 months months old and LOVES this toy! It helps with his teething and when he wants to snuggle! Please be sure to clean this with soap and water before letting your child put it in his mouth!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gorgeous Gal Products

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: The picture is misleading. You do not get both, which is stated in the description. You get one or the other, and you cannot choose, therefore it doesn’t help to order it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson at 2 months and it's a perfect first toy because of the softness. He is now teething and it's one of his favorites. He loves it so much he now has two! He loves the crinkle sound and softness as well as the teethers. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 month old son so that he would have something to hold onto and chew on as he starts to teeth. This did not come with a ring to hang it on the car seat and the head isn't even sturdy enough for him to really hold. It's cute but not quite what I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: Since about 2.5 to 3 months this has been the only toy he literally clings onto. He loves to use it as a teether and to squeeze the center with the crinkly paper. It's a great buy for the price too.
customer_reviews.author: kel

customer_reviews.text: i love this for my baby boy of 7 months. helps alot when they need something to entertain them with making noise, great for teething stage. and just to play with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, flexible and practical
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this product has a dual component...it can be used as a teether ( rubber feet) or it can be cuddled and used to attract attention with the crinkly paper used for litttle horsey tummy. I let my baby use it for a cuddly toy now during play and I will allow her to explore the rubber feet when she gets older or shows and interest to.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought it when it was on sale I washed it and wash quick this is a third time i wash it,it's durable I did put in the dryer to test it and it stay the same i do recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Pamela rojas

customer_reviews.title: Only comes with one, not two...
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and my twins like it BUT, the way it's described is tricky. Seems that it should have come with two not just one. I'm a bit dissatisfied with the fact that I paid almost $12 for one measly little toy 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought he’d at least enjoy the crinkle noise but that feature was underwhelming as ...
customer_reviews.text: Small and flimsy. My little guy had no interest in this toy. I thought he’d at least enjoy the crinkle noise but that feature was underwhelming as well.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie jane

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughters favorite toy. Only problem is that it came with a few holes in the stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My sons teething and loves his little giraffe! He chew on him a lot and it is snuggly as well! Best part is it can just go in the washer!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Smith

customer_reviews.title: Baby’s favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing. He’s 4 months and cuddles it, chews on it and loves to have it near him. Only negative is it makes a crinkly noise which baby loves but he can’t have it to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Summers

customer_reviews.title: CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great nephew last year for Christmas and he loved it. My only complaint is that I couldn't choose which one I received ~ I just had to take whichever one I received. The elephant was really cute but I wanted the giraffe because that is what his nursery was decorated in.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Woods

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: We have the giraffe, although my son loves to squeeze the toy so it makes the crunch sound, the ends that are for teething are a bit big for his mouth but still a great toy
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Sliger

customer_reviews.title: What will you get?
customer_reviews.text: I believed I was purchasing the giraffe and received the elephant. I mean it's cute but I was looking forward to the giraffe. Guess I need to look at all the pics next time. It's superb quality and super snuggly!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. L

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for babies!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 month old and it's her favorite toy. My son loved them when he was a baby and used to play with it so much it wore out the crinkly part inside of it! Bought it on here because it was cheaper than Walmart or target
customer_reviews.author: Christina Maria

customer_reviews.title: 4 month old loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Didnt read well enough, thought there was two. My 4 month old loves this though! She will scrunch it up holding it to her mouth. She doesn't chew on the plastic part yet, but likes the crinkle. I've just been hand washing.
customer_reviews.author: Mercede Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Just the elephant
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute BUT make sure to read the details. 1) you don’t get both and 2) it’s the elephant. Either way I still like the product I just wasn’t aware it was just the elephant
customer_reviews.author: heather mcnally

customer_reviews.title: YOU ONLY GET ONE OR THE OTHER
customer_reviews.text: It's a good teether my daughter loves it but the advertising is incorrect because it makes it seem like you are going to get two teethers and you only get one or the other. Otherwise it's a good toy for your little one
customer_reviews.author: Jill Gillombardo

customer_reviews.title: I tought both toys came together but got only one.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it 5 stars because it is one of my baby's favorite toy but I was dissapointed because in the picture it shows a giraffe but I only got the elephant.
customer_reviews.author: lidia

customer_reviews.title: Could improve but nice for price point
customer_reviews.text: Hard for 5 month old to hold because there is not a handle. I wish it came with a strap that hooked onto things. Product seems well made and does have a nice soft feel and crinkle noise.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cute and washable.
customer_reviews.text: Made well and withstands laundering in the washing machine. Perfect size for little hands and good for teething.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

product_meta.title: Bright Starts Snuggle & Teethe Toy (One toy, style may vary)
product_meta.description: Style:Snuggle TeetherAdd creature comforts to baby’s uncomfortable teething time. The Snuggle and Teethe safari themed toys are made to soothe teething toddlers wherever they go. Baby will love the snuggly soft fabric and captivating crinkles of the giraffe and elephant characters. Not only are these toys fun to cuddle, but their feet double as teethers to help soothe aching gums. Relief has never felt so sweet Note: customer will receive one character at random.
feature_bullets: NOTE: This is an assorted product; color and print advertised are subjected to vary
Soft, high quality plush fabric bodies with pattern accents and crinkle bellies
Teether feet with textures soothe baby’s gums. Recommended age is 0 to 36 months
Styles may vary, assortment of 2 characters:giraffe and elephant, customer will receive one of the 2 characters
Care Wipe clean with damp cloth and mild soap, do not immerse in water

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,896 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
